text: Stanly Teixeira dos Santos, known as Stanly (born 23 April 1994) is a Brazilian football player who plays for Cesarense. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Trofense on 1 February 2015 in a game against Tondela. ==References== ==External links== Category:1994 births Category:People from Bahia Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Associação Atlética Portuguesa (Santos) players Category:C.D. title: Stanly (footballer)
